text: Q22.| The number of leaf-level blocks needed if blocks are at most70% full is Solution:1429 There will be [ 0.70 x pieat) = 10,70 x 31 ] = 21 search keys per leaf node. Since the file is not ordered on that field, there will have to be a search record for each record in the file, or 30,000 of them. So the number of leaf blocks is [ 30,000 / 21 = 1429 blocks. (The ceiling because the last block will be partially full.)
